meanings.definition: To express pleasure or joy to someone for an achievement or good fortune.
meanings.sent1: I congratulated my friend on winning the game.
meanings.sent2: She congratulated her sister on getting a promotion.
meanings.sent3: The cat congratulated the dog on catching a ball.
meanings.sent4: The sun congratulated the flowers on blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The teacher congratulated the students on their hard work.

meanings.definition: To offer good wishes or praise to someone for a job well done.
meanings.sent1: They congratulated the team on their victory.
meanings.sent2: He congratulated his colleague on completing the project.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel congratulated the bird on finding a tasty nut.
meanings.sent4: The wind congratulated the kite on soaring high in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The audience congratulated the performers on their amazing show.
